title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: The Fourth Industrial Revolution and Blended Learning: Mobile-Based Science Field

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of science (high school level) required
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain 80% or more of the core components (online/offline integration strategies) of blended learning models.
Learners complete 90% or more of five or more science-related microcontents per week through mobile microlearning.
Learners effectively utilize collaboration tools for scientific problem-solving three or more times during offline workshops.
Learners rate the applicability of science knowledge acquired in a blended learning environment as 3.0 or higher on a 4-point scale (1–4).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
